# Group Sense

> Multi-party conversation intelligence layer

Group Sense is a library for detecting patterns in group chat message streams
and transforming them into self-contained queries for downstream AI systems. This enables
existing single-user AI agents to participate in group conversations based on criteria
defined in natural language, without requiring training on multi-party dialogue.


## User Guide

- [Overview](https://gradion-ai.github.io/group-sense/index.md): Introduction to Group Sense
- [Installation](https://gradion-ai.github.io/group-sense/installation/index.md): Installation and API key setup
- [Basics](https://gradion-ai.github.io/group-sense/basics/index.md): Core concepts and reasoner types
- [Examples](https://gradion-ai.github.io/group-sense/examples/index.md): Usage examples for different engagement patterns
- [Integration](https://gradion-ai.github.io/group-sense/integration/index.md): Integrating Group Sense into applications

## API Documentation

- [Message](https://gradion-ai.github.io/group-sense/api/message/index.md): Message data structures
- [Reasoner](https://gradion-ai.github.io/group-sense/api/reasoner/index.md): Reasoner interfaces and implementations
